;Wing Chun Is The Foundation of Jeet Kune Do:
;

For pupils wishing to study JKD, there is an expectation and a hope that you will come absent from it not just finding out JKD moves, but by generating your personal meaningful, individual form.
;
;No matter whether you are involved in Bruce Lee, his combating style or just like martial arts - there's a put for you within the research of Jeet Kune Do. As opposed to some other martial arts which strive to mold and "perfect" you in their personal picture with a selected, explicit "way" of carrying out points - JKD accepts and welcomes you as you are. Males, girls and kids of all ages have quickly found a put within this distinctive martial art, and even lifelong masters experience they nonetheless have considerably to discover about this at any time-evolving kind.
;
;Mastering JKD - Which Department Do You Choose?
;
;There are two well-known branches of JKD - one particular which specials specially and straight with Bruce Lee's teachings and another which is far more rooted in his principles and concepts - making use of them as a springboard to appear to your own psychological, mental and physical discovery and conclusion. No branch or the other is "right" and picking one is a individual selection that you will appear to make the much more you are involved in practising Jeet Kune Do. Once more, this martial art "methods what it preaches" in making it possible for you to arrive ahead with certainly no combating expertise or prior expertise and just providing you the equipment you need to have to make it a lot more meaningful for yourself.
;
;Jeet Kune Do History and Qualifications
;
;To definitely appreciate this exclusive martial art, you have to recognize that it is centered entirely close to Bruce Lee - no matter whether rooted in his writings or passed along by students who realized JKD below his tutelage. As Bruce Lee aged, evolved and realized from a number of fighting sorts, so too does Jeet Kune Do proceed to broaden its achieve and progressed. It fundamentally encompasses exactly what you need to have to know with out any of the fluff and filler of other preventing styles - due to the fact when you are engaged in a struggle with an attacker - what really matters most to you? Undertaking your katas or preventing to help save your daily life?
;
;This is the place JKD genuinely shines - providing you the necessities to defend oneself and whetting your appetite for increased knowledge by combining a lot of distinct philosophies, theories, moves and techniques to layout a fighting model that satisfies you personally.
;
